docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Puppetchef is a web automation tool that uses Puppeteer to execute web automation recipes defined in YAML format.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: npm install puppetchef

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: puppetchef <recipe> [options]

docs.title: Command Line Options
docs.text:
• <recipe>: Recipe file in YAML format (required).
  • -c, --conf <file>: Configuration file (default: puppetchefrc).
  • --syntax-check: Validate recipe only, without executing (default: false).

docs.title: Environment Variables
docs.text:
• PUPPETCHEF_INFO: Enables debugging at the INFO level.
  • PUPPETCHEF_DEBUG: Enables debugging at the DEBUG level.
  • PUPPETCHEF_LOGFILE: Path to the log file (default: stdout) when a debug level is set.

docs.title: Validate and Execute Recipes
docs.text:
Validate recipe without executing
puppetchef recipe.yaml --syntax-check
Execute recipe
puppetchef recipe.yaml
Debug a recipe and output to file
PUPPETCHEF_DEBUG=1 PUPPETCHEF_LOGFILE=/tmp/puppetchef.log puppetchef recipe.yaml

docs.title: Create a New Recipe
docs.text:
recipe.yaml
url: "https://example.com"
name: "Login Test"
tasks:
  - name: "Login"
    steps:
      - puppetchef.builtin.common:
          command: "fill_out"
          selector: "#username"
          data: "testuser"
      - puppetchef.builtin.common:
          command: "fill_out"
          selector: "#password"
          data: "password123"
      - puppetchef.builtin.common:
          command: "click"
          selector: "#submit"

docs.title: Write a plugins Module
Install The Plugin In Your Project
docs.text: npm install plugins

docs.title: Use The Plugin In Your Recipes
docs.text:
recipe.yaml
name: Example Recipe
url: https://example.com/demo-url
tasks:
  - name: "Custom Action"
    steps:
      - puppetchef.plugins.plugin:
          command: "customAction"
          selector: "#username"
        # Make the return value of customAction available to the following steps
        register: ret
      - puppetchef.builtin.common:
          command: debug
          data: "{{ ret.y }}"
          format: "Debugging: %s"
        # Conditionals for when to execute this step
        when: ret.x > 0
